[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@rushstack/heft](./heft.md) &gt; [IIncrementalCopyOperation](./heft.iincrementalcopyoperation.md) &gt; [onlyIfChanged](./heft.iincrementalcopyoperation.onlyifchanged.md)

## IIncrementalCopyOperation.onlyIfChanged property

If true, the file will be copied only if the source file is contained in the IHeftTaskRunIncrementalHookOptions.changedFiles map.

**Signature:**

```typescript
onlyIfChanged?: boolean;
```
